attributes.action: Include trans people in proposed ban on medieval practice of conversion therapy.
attributes.additional_details: It's simple, there's no LGB without the T. Absolutely no reason why trans people should not be included. It's not 'woke' in  2022 we need this practice banned for all, regardless. No further consultations and delays. Futher delay means more risk of abuse.
attributes.background: Conversion 'therapy' is a warped belief that you can change someone's gender identity or sexual orientation. It could be electrotherapy, prayer, bullying, corrective rape, and other abhorrent behaviours. In UK, all the major counselling & psychotherapy bodies incl. NHS say it's cruel and dangerous

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
